ARABIC: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And those who do wrong will have a punishment besides that but most of them do not know it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely there are other torments besides this for those who are wicked, though most of them do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely a chastisement awaits the wrong-doers even before the coming of that Day; but most of them do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The unjust will suffer other torments besides this but most of them do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed for the unjust is another punishment before this, but most of them do not know. (Punishment in the grave is proven by this verse.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, for those who do wrong, there is another punishment before this; but most of them know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely those who are unjust shall have a punishment besides that (in the world), but most of them do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And there surely awaits the evildoers a chastisement beyond even that, but most of them know it not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily, for those who do wrong, there is a punishment beyond that. But most of them know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, for those who do wrong there is a punishment besides that, though most of them do not know it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily for those who do wrong there is a torment before that; but most of them know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed there is a punishment besides that for those who do wrong, but most of them do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily, for those who do wrong, there is another punishment besides this: But most of them understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, for those who do wrong, there is another punishment (i.e. the torment in this world and in their graves) before this, but most of them know not. [Tafsir At-Tabari, Vol. 27, Page 36].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For the harmdoers there is indeed, a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For those who do wrong, there is a punishment besides that; but most of them do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:47] And assuredly for those who do wrong, by their [persistence in] disbelief, there is a chastisement beyond that, in this world, before their death — thus they were punished with famine and drought for seven years, and with being killed on the day of Badr; but most of them do not know, that the chastisement will befall them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily, for those who do wrong) the idolaters: the disbelievers of Mecca, (there is a punishment) in the grave (beyond that) other than the chastisement of Gehenna. (But most of them) all of them (know not) this nor believe in it.
